Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: This is half-done. It's been reprioritized because lifecycle will operate as a new chaincode (and not a new version of the existing). Bug is also probably the wrong approach, it should be a story.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: System chaincodes are usually a bad idea. _lifecycle is the only one which has chaincode properties.Â Let's see how long we can go without requiring more than one version.
